channel.title: Stat limit & exp limit
channel.description:
......i want to know how to raise the limit of the stats on my server..... as well as the limit of the exp......
***this is last to do before my server is finally in its stablelized form*** (without me closing server every 5 mins updating it)
anyways someone plz help me......
also i need to know how to make it so that my server reconizes that when someone has no runes they can't use a spell (rite now you can use spells without any runes......)
